entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 07:59 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
